entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] MAUI app crashes when XAML Hot Reloading ShellContent within Shell.xaml #13775
  • WebView Source Binding does not update when navigating #13774
  • MAUI WinUI Drag/Drop Not Working On Same UIElement #13770
    Backlog
  • should try to restore the style of each platform. #13768
    Backlog
  • SwipeViewItems aren't added to the `LogicalChildren` of the `SwipeView` control once they are revealed. #13765
    Backlog
  • MAUI application error due to entry element in background operation #13762
    Backlog
  • Support x:Name for code generation in DataTemplate #13760
  • IPreference not initialized #13759
  • Get the MAUI window object from the platform window object #13758
  • Certain kinds of PathGeometry result in an unhandled runtime exception #13757
  • ListView sets Cell's BindingContext to self, causing multiple warnings and/or InvalidCastExceptions #13754

Closed

  • The alpha check for using OverFullScreen on a transparent modal is currently incorrect #12031
    Backlog
  • CommunityToolkit.Mvvm.SourceGenerators has errors #13773
  • [Enhancement] Automatically importing specific resources #13766
  • App crash in Tab ShellContent page if any Entry control is there and changing tab and comeback to same tab #12644
    Backlog
  • Weird behavior with Compiled Bindings #13764
  • RadioButton colors doesn't work #13771
  • Another problem Occurs in Release Mode, Dynamic Color or Programmatically C# not Changed... [RELEASE MODE ONLY] #10181
  • Binding BackgroundColor on Button not propagate when changed in Release .NET MAUI MVVM (Android device) #13772
  • [Android/iOS] Scrollview Direction=Both not working with Label as the content #7979
  • ScrollView‘s HorizontalScrollBar is not visible and ScrollView cannot scroll horizontally #9000
  • Vertical scrolling in <ScrollView Orientation="Both"> not working #7811
  • Cannot scroll vertically when Orientation is Both #5759
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Scrollview is not scrolling vertically #2768
    Backlog
  • CollectionView Windows Memory Leak, Android Laggy scrolling #13557
    Backlog
  • VisualElement Background/Shadow `Notify` code creates a strong relationship between the brush and the element #12344
    Backlog
  • iOS Rotate animation is very choppy due to LOTS of unneceesary measure cycles and makes application unusably slow #11891
    Backlog
  • Make DynamicResource bindings be supported as normal bindings #13724
  • Unable to upload IPA file to Apple Appstore #13763
  • SwipeView causes Shadows to be clipped #9062
  • [Windows] `WindowOverlay.DisableUITouchEventPassthrough` does not work #13049
    Backlog
  • Android app crash with NavigationPage in Release build #11978
  • How do I Pin a Maui App to a specific version? #8985

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix ClearButtonVisibility and VerticalTextAlignment issues with invisible Entry #13769
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry

Merged

  • [Housekeeping] Alternative to #11795 #12134
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix bidirectional scrolling on Android #13623
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `VisualElement.Background` #13656
    area/controls 🎮
  • Skip GradientBackgroundInitializesCorrectly on iOS #13767
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActi… #12347
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, backport/suggested
  • [Android] Fix shadow clipping issue using SwipeView #13616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13755
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed RadioButtonGallery TemplateFromStyle page. #13756
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton

Updated

  • Run templates on Android and iOS #13662
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • Bugfix for text not properly aligned with radioButton when in RTL for Android #13610
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Blank image when Source set to null or on image loading error #13614
    area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Allow SearchBar to take full width on Android #13716
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Only cache the dynamic AppTheme and LayoutDirection values in Controls #11200
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/android 🤖, area/theme
  • [MacOS/iOS] Fixed incorrect color of RadioButton in Dark Mode using Default Control Template. #13215
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Force menu rebuild when window is closed (#10702) #13709
    community ✨
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Implement ScrollView Orientation #13657
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, layout-scrollview
  • Make Android sizing of ShapeViews consistent with iOS and Windows #6206
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, area/drawing ✏️
  • Catch InvalidProtocolBufferException creating EncryptedSharedPreferences #13599
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Android] Avoid to disconnect a disposed PlatformView on Android #12881
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Ensure an exact measure for the nested horizontal scrollview #13554
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Remove FontImageExtension #5012
    area/Xaml </>, area/fonts 🅰️, .NET 8 Planning
  • Change Windows WebView Cookies to CoreWebView2 #13518
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Fix iOS ListView Footer Missing (#13560) #13744
    community ✨, area/ListView
  • Reinstate WebView cookie functionality for Android & iOS #13736
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
  • We no longer need to reference BuildTools #13687
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Correctly handle ContainerView changes #13114
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
  • [iOS] Scroll with the keyboard to not block entries and editors #13499
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview, keyboard
  • [C] Properly set SelectedItem and Index #13740
    area/Xaml </>, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Microsoft.Maui.Devices.Flashlight: Check if supported #13703
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Reenable tests for iOS, as this should work now #13686
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix iOS ListView cell gone hidden (#11287) #13669
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/ListView
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, area/theme
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    t/breaking 💥, area/modal, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
